name: Mission Control (NovaGamesTM)
description:
This is a School Project (Early Prototype)

Warning: This Game Requires 4 Players To Complete The Game!

This Prototype Is Fully Working.

This game is made for the introduction week of the first year students for HKU. Make a team of four and try to solve all the puzzles! Use for example Discord as communication service, because the puzzles are only solveable with close communication.

Story

An alien intruded the space station and the automatic destruction alarm has been triggered. Will you and your team be able to solve all the puzzles and yeet the alien out of the space station? Or will you be blown up by the automatic destruction alarm (not present in this prototype).

Created by Team 4 (ATLA).

Prototype was made in two weeks with a team of four.
